twitch_info.title: The game i got for secret santa! 7

message.body: i meant to make the ceiling death
can i still update things using the command?
I have spent the past 5 min wanting to type certain things
@langlerangle I was telling Plasma the other day how amazing it is you made this. I respect him very much, and this game is so awesome and perfect for him. itâ€™s just really awesome you made this.
this is one of the few fangames I have seen that I actually would love top
butâ€¦..I am not really goodâ€¦.so I can dream and appreciate watching it at least, haha
sup gl with the funny game :)
are you near the end or trying to find funny explore things or what?
yeah i was playing bento game
it turned out to get quite a bit harder than i expected lol
thankfully multiple puzzles to choose from but one puzzle completely stumped me
same devs as the golf game but def harder imo
i would've been fine with easier puzzle games for today lol
naaaah i play those puzzle games offstream
no chance i would've streamed spacechem when i beat that lol
if something seems too hard.. youre doing it right. always believe the maker is incompetent
spending 7 hours on a stage should be illegal
this may as well be a puzzle game
clearly i havent been paying attention
maybe there is no winning and this is just the clear screen
slam into the wall, land on this, sneeze, jump over here, go to town, the boys are back
can you scan the entire room so i can make a map and map every route and movement so i can figure out the solution
a zoom out would be nice
cant wait for others to try my game when the bundle releases c:
we almost got 67 games, it was so close
dang he looks quite in shape
yeah he's an anime girl after all
then you can play THE game
clear screen: congratulations on clearing the demo! now onto the real game
you check the readme and it says "stage 1 music:"
those breakable blocks that offset the background are so neat to look at
the challenge is devious in nature
ive just been playing whatever santa games have been released on delfruit and like, this year's bundle is gonna be genuinely wild
are you even going this way or are you going the other way? i genuinely cant tell lmao
holy how is there still so much stuff
there is no spike for me.. must be your monitor
dude i thought i made my game too long lmao
there's always gotta be one overachiever...
whats interesting is that the vast, vast majority of the time must have been spent exclusively on level design
the visuals and mechanics could probably be set up (relatively) quickly but it just gets a ridiculous amount of mileage out of them
almost all the saves were very quick to make
it also comes down to how much time the creators have. spending 1 month on a game vs. spending 1 day
because most of them you can do in tons of different ways
thats very true, but also some people are just capable of working much faster than me even with the same amount of available time
this person probably has their design process down to a science
thats just speaking for myself though
it's just the type of gameplay that's easy to make. Like in my big project i'm working on right now i can only do at most like 2 or 3 saves a day.
is there something further to the right?
all I know is you made bees
its all up to you plasma no one has cleared this game
i heard this game is gonna be removed from the pack if you don't clear it
it feels like it was only yesterday... 7 times over...
any games that wont be in the bunbun?
i hope it has a save with 3 double diamonds in a row
one day we'll get the secret santa fc
oh yeah I think I read there was 1 dq
i'll make sure i sign up so i can leave just for you plasma <3
~~and everyone is proud of their work and what they got~~
oh right i guess technically this year had a maker level lol
someone had a code in the thanks for playing room lol
dude next year I will make a gd level. I hope I roll plasma
seems they built the stage in maker first then ported it to a project
and yeah to be fair, good stage
dude if i had to make a boss fight no way im not making it in maker
i know someone good at bosses
it was pat actually, he has a tutorial on youtube
probably a bit complicated bit it works
this is similar levels of "hey guys i made my first game i think it's alright it's called BONK teehee :)"
yeah mr let me steal this idea from cosmo
yeah its not even harder than soulless gate 1
he was talking about wanting to make a long adventure avoidance
meanwhile i'm drawing god damn smiley faces on a google image of dirt like a god damn cave man
my style was humour cause my art was god awful lol
@langlerangle I'd say it's still challenging to make the saves actually flow well
and I imagine this is where most of the effort in this game went because the visuals and the mechanics are more or less the same throughout
but most saves in the game are not like this
i was really unhappy with the second half of this save
ok good job but it continues?
that was supposed to be in line with the platform
hate to be that guy but to me that invalidates the clear
the problem with making your game huge, you miss small things
nah just make 100 floors of corridor needle. huge game 0 skips
im sure plasma would much rather be playing corridor needle right now
actually scratch the needle. make a 100f long corridor
whats the rundown plasma, whats taking so long to beat a secret santa game...
Barbuta Escape got its long awaited delfruit release!
this save used to be part of the last save
do you know who the maker is yet? this is crazy stuff
i single handedly made all the santa games
who the hell makes a game with java
oh i guess its notch's alt, that explains a lot
slay the spire was made in java
Mods for sts are .jar files at the very least
but for real I have a friend who exclusively makes games in java, he says that it's quite convenient once you build up your own library of convenience functions
notch took revenge on the mc devs removing his name from the credits by having the entire game made in java
it's mainly garbage collection which is annoying
how many keys do you have?
i was gone for a bit, did you clear that other save?
is this like, fully off the map in its own area or something? or just in an area you havent visited yet
shame i wont be able to see whats behind the door, good night
zurai was streaming a minute ago. coincidence?
the term you can do it is engraved in my head with the zurai audio
I was watching him earlier today so maybe there's a spirit in the air..
though ive been listening to this since nal raided while reading
I still find myself replaying through I wanna follow it from time to time. short needle + short avoidance is the best formula
You really went for the jugular with that joke
we are blessed to still have this many talented makers around. like gwiz cooking up new christmas deliveries games is insane
tho I doubt we will get a 4
seeing fangame makers pull off steam releases is always rad
I mean how are gwiz games not real games. most of the art is og. and if the game was on steam we wouldnt have funny mario bosses
yeah I mean erik made it work
hardest thing Id say is own soundtrack but gwiz got that covered
I need bed. good luck with this challenge. I hope the door leads to a cutscene that just plays the buy balloons trailer
i came back in after being away and took my shot from reading chat
later? oh ok thanks for the stream
goodbye thanks for stream!!!!!!!!! maybe TOMORROW will be the day....
You would be giving them what they want
you don't know what i want
i was playing puzzle games earlier
what i want is to delay your clear indefinitely by saying thanks for stream at the start of every stream. i want this because i think it would be funny
do you have any idea how close you are now?
yeah purrf hates people playing games
nono i gamed it out, next year we get DOUBLE bundle
at the end of this save is 30 seconds luck avoidance
at the end of this save is 30 million ants
you may have wonn but will your pc
you said "alright here it is" and then instantly died to the wall
thanks for stream for real this time
wait this is another ruse isn't it
